markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs=""
>
[Compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A compass helps you [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) or navigate, provided you're in a location with uniform magnetic fields. Without a compass, you take a –2 item penalty to these checks (similar to using a [shoddy item](/Rules.aspx?ID=197)).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Compass (Lensatic)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

</row>

</column>

---

A lensatic compass gives you a +1 item bonus to these checks.
